about_the_game:
Introducing Flooftopia: An Innovative Social MMORPG Adventure!

Embark on a captivating journey in Flooftopia, where your decisions shape not only your character's fate but also the entire game world. This non-combat-based MMORPG redefines social gameplay, offering a unique experience for every player. Your character, known as the "Floof," will navigate a world filled with skills, professions, and endless possibilities.

Social MMORPG Experience:
Flooftopia stands out with its social MMORPG foundation. Immerse yourself in a world where your character's choices and progress impact the game. Decide who to align with, build a village, and watch as your decisions influence the course of the game.

Skill and Profession System:
Explore a diverse range of skills and professions, from fishing and cooking to crafting and mining. Level up your chosen paths to unlock new content, abilities, and opportunities. Customize your gameplay by leveraging different professions, each offering unique bonuses to you and your community.

Collaborative Gameplay:
In the spirit of social MMORPG, Flooftopia encourages collaboration. Work together with others to maximize the benefits of your professions. For instance, a fully maxed-out miner skill not only boosts your efficiency but also grants a significant bonus to your entire party. Team up and enhance your skills collectively!

Customizable Houses:
Claim your piece of Flooftopia with a personal house to travel to, build upon, and customize. As you level up your skills and complete quests, upgrade your house for both cosmetic and gameplay significance. Your house reflects your journey, showcasing your achievements and progress.

Dynamic Villages:
Form or join villages, each with its own unique character. As you contribute through your skills, house upgrades, and more, provide additional benefits to the village and fellow players. Choose your village wisely, as it plays a crucial role in your Flooftopia adventure.

Flooftopia invites you to a world where your choices matter, skills define your path, and social interaction shapes the future. Join the community-driven adventure and be a part of the ever-evolving Flooftopia universe!

name: Flooftopia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 2.8 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Flooftopia is a non-combat-based MMORPG set in a fantasy world filled with adorable Floofs. Shape your adventure by level up skills, professions, taking on bosses, customizing houses, and join other players and make a village. There's always something to explore in the world of Flooftopia!
